title: Netflix stock plunges 35% in company's worst day since 2004: Streaming giant loses $54 BILLION in value after shedding 200,000 subscribers in first quarter as viewers complain there's 'nothing to watch'
description: Netflix stock plunges 35% in company's worst day since 2004: Streaming giant loses $54 BILLION in value after shedding 200,000 subscribers in first quarter as viewers complain there's 'nothing to watch'
